fields: [{"name":"pixels","type":"Pixel[][]","description":"the 2D array of `Pixel` objects that make up this `Image`"},{"name":"width","type":"int","description":"the width of this `Image`"},{"name":"height","type":"int","description":"the height of this `Image`"},{"name":"DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_COLOR = Color.WHITE","type":"static final Color","description":"the default background color of an empty `Image`"},{"name":"MAX_WIDTH = 400","type":"static final int","description":"the maximum width of an `Image`"},{"name":"MAX_HEIGHT = 400","type":"static final int","description":"the maximum height of an `Image`"}]
name: Image

methods.name: Image
methods.content: Creates a new `Image` object using the pixel information from the specified file.

methods.name: Image
methods.content: Creates a new `Image` object by copying the pixels from the specified `Image` object.

methods.name: Image
methods.content: Creates an empty `Image` object filled with the default background color.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"width","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the width of the `Image` to create"},{"name":"height","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the height of the `Image` to create"}]

methods.name: getPixel
methods.content: Gets the `Pixel` object at the specified x and y coordinate.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the x coordinate of the `Pixel`"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the y coordinate of the `Pixel`"}]

methods.name: setPixel
methods.content: Sets the `Pixel` at the specified x and y coordinate to the `Color` provided.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the `x` coordinate to set the `Pixel`"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the `y` coordinate to set the `Pixel`"},{"name":"color","type":"Color","required":true,"description":"the `Color` to use to set the `Pixel`"}]
methods.syntax: `public void setPixel(int x, int y, Color color)`

methods.name: getWidth
methods.content: Returns the width of this `Image` in pixels.

methods.name: getHeight
methods.content: Returns the height of this `Image` in pixels.

methods.name: clear
methods.content: Clears this `Image` and fills it with the specified `Color`.
